title: Retirement Advisor: Where To Retire
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: ElderIndex.org allows users to compare the retirement cost of living among up to four different places at a time. This podcast (6:57) suggests that a change in location is an important tool in the advisor’s retirement-planning tool kit since housing and health costs vary greatly from place to place, and notes the case of a couple whose move reduced costs by about 25 percent. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
